title: Carrying articles
context: ยง291C-146 Carrying articles. No person operating a bicycle shall carry any package, bundle, or article which prevents the use of both hands in the control and operation of the bicycle. A person operating a bicycle shall keep at least one hand on the handlebars at all times. [L 1971, c 150, pt of ยง1; am L 1984, c 273, ยง13]
